metadata.title: CVE-2017-5416 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In certain circumstances a networking event listener can be prematurelyreleased. This appears to result in a null dereference in practice. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 52 and Thunderbird < 52.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5416` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '52.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
